text: Kneecap (spelled KNEECAP) is a hip hop band from Belfast, Northern Ireland. It has three members: Mo Chara, Móglaí Bap and DJ Próvaí. They sing in English and Irish and often show they support Irish republicanism. "C.E.A.R.T.A." (Irish for "R.I.G.H.T.S.", meaning human rights), their first song, came out in 2017. They released more singles, such as "Get Your Brits Out", then their first album, 3CAG, in 2018. == References == Category:2010s Irish music groups Category:2017 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Hip hop bands Category:Musical groups established in 2017 Category:Musicians from Belfast
title: Kneecap (band)
